origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'TechResearchAPI.get_cost', 'description': 'This function provides the estimated cost of technology research based on the technology type and specific research area.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'technology', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of technology being researched, e.g., autonomous_vehicles, renewable_energy.'}, {'name': 'researchArea', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific area of research within the technology, e.g., software_development, hardware_engineering.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'cost', 'description': 'The estimated research cost for the specified technology and area.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 TechResearchAPI.get_cost, 它的参数输入如下: 'technology'是'autonomous_vehicles', 'researchArea'是'software_development'.
